scripts.c: pnpm run clean && pnpm run compile
scripts.deploy:app: pnpm run before:app && BACKEND_INFRASTRUCTURE_JSON_CONFIG=$(pnpm -s run config:backend:create) FRONTEND_INFRASTRUCTURE_JSON_CONFIG=$(pnpm -s run config:frontend:create) cdktf deploy
scripts.plan:frontend:local: pnpm run cdktf:clean && pnpm run before:app && FRONTEND_INFRASTRUCTURE_JSON_CONFIG=$(pnpm run config:frontend:create) cdktf plan
scripts.plan:backend:local: pnpm run cdktf:clean && pnpm run before:app && BACKEND_INFRASTRUCTURE_JSON_CONFIG=$(pnpm run config:backend:create) cdktf plan
scripts.plan:app: pnpm run cdktf:clean && pnpm run before:app && BACKEND_INFRASTRUCTURE_JSON_CONFIG=$(pnpm -s run config:backend:create) FRONTEND_INFRASTRUCTURE_JSON_CONFIG=$(pnpm -s run config:frontend:create) cdktf plan
scripts.plan:bootstrap: pnpm run cdktf:clean && jq '. + {"app":"pnpm tsx ./src/bootstrap/main.ts","stackName":"tfBootstrap"}' cdktf.base.json  > cdktf.json && cdktf plan
scripts.synth:app: pnpm run cdktf:clean && pnpm run before:app && BACKEND_INFRASTRUCTURE_JSON_CONFIG=$(pnpm -s run config:backend:create) FRONTEND_INFRASTRUCTURE_JSON_CONFIG=$(pnpm -s run config:frontend:create) cdktf synth
scripts.synth:bootstrap: pnpm run cdktf:clean && pnpm run before:bootstrap && cdktf synth
